entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.3°C

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Clearing near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 08 January 2023
